    • Constructor Detail

      • TractorBeam

        public TractorBeam()
        Instantiates a new Tractor Beam card. Sets the field color to BLU calling the constructor of weapon card (the super class). Creates the list of recharge cost setting its value to BLU. Creates the list of effects setting its value to BaseMode,PunisherMode. Creates the list of punisher mode cost (cost of alternative fire mode) settings it to RED,YELLOW.

      • baseMode

        public void baseMode(Map map,
                     Square destSquare,
                     Player currentPlayer,
                     Player target1)
              throws NotVisibleTarget,
                     NotValidDistance,
                     MapException
        Move a player by zero, one or two movements in a square that current player can see and shoot him.
        Parameters:
        map - the map of the game.
        destSquare - the square where shot player is moved.
        currentPlayer - the current player.
        target1 - the player you want to shoot.
        Throws:
        NotVisibleTarget
        NotValidDistance
        MapException
